NO_GUILD_MEMBERSHIP: No guild membership. Join or create a guild to continue.
PROJECT_NO_ACCESS: You don't have access to this project
PROJECT_PIN_PERMISSION_REQUIRED: Only guild admins and initiative managers can pin projects
PROJECT_DOCUMENT_WRONG_INITIATIVE: Document belongs to a different initiative
PROJECT_CANNOT_ASSIGN_OWNER_TO_ROLE: Cannot assign owner permission to a role
PROJECT_ROLE_WRONG_INITIATIVE: Role must belong to the project's initiative
TASK_ALREADY_IN_PROJECT: Task already belongs to this project
TASK_CANNOT_MOVE_TO_TEMPLATE: Cannot move task to a template project
TASK_PROJECT_MISMATCH: Task does not belong to this project
TASK_STATUS_NOT_FOUND_FOR_PROJECT: Task status not found for this project
TASK_ASSIGNEES_NOT_FOUND: One or more assignees not found
TASK_TAGS_NOT_FOUND: One or more tags not found
SUBTASK_NOT_FOUND_FOR_TASK: Subtask not found for this task
TASK_STATUS_CANNOT_REMOVE_LAST: Cannot remove the final status for this category
TASK_STATUS_FALLBACK_REQUIRED: A fallback status is required when tasks exist
TASK_STATUS_FALLBACK_MUST_DIFFER: Fallback status must be different from the deleted status
TASK_STATUS_FALLBACK_CATEGORY_MISMATCH: Fallback status must share the same category
fallback: Something went wrong. Please try again.
